original_text: He supposed that his brothers would understand that God was giving them salvation by his hand, but they did not understand.
korean_text: 그는 그의 형제들이 하나님께서 자기의 손을 통하여 구원해 주시는 것을 깨달으리라고 생각하였으나 그들이 깨닫지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: He supposed that his brothers would understand
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 형제들이 이해할 것이라고 생각했다

sentences.original_text: that God was giving them salvation
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들에게 구원을 주고 계신다는 것을
